Title: Topical antibiotics for chronic suppurative otitis media
Abstract: © 2018 The Cochrane Collaboration.This is a protocol for a Cochrane Review (Intervention). The objectives are as follows: To assess the effects of topical antibiotics for people with chronic suppurative otitis media (CSOM).
